content: description the sunnyside vest is a stylish and versatile crochet pattern that is perfect for intermediate level crocheters the vest features adorable motifs along the back and has a flattering v-neckline with a 2 button closure it s the perfect addition to any wardrobe this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make the vest plus a free copy of the printable pdf digital download you can even customize your yarn color a video tutorial is available on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/sunnyside-vest-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/43cb8 3 https //youtu be/u374b4vijq8
